game.name: Mine
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation
game.shortDescription: Mine is a horror game in the style of back rooms. Accompanied by an excellent visual, it will allow you to plunge into the nightmare happening around the hero. Realistic camera and sounds complement your emotions. And monsters will create tension and make you pretty scared.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mine is a horror game in the style of back rooms. Accompanied by an excellent visual, it will allow you to plunge into the nightmare happening around the hero. Realistic camera and sounds complement your emotions. And monsters will create tension and make you pretty scared.

reviewHighlights.text: Mine is a compact, atmosphere-driven horror experience that thrives on simplicity and claustrophobic tension. Developed and published by 99cent, the g...
